snippet: The order from the judge, Col. James L. Pohl of the Army, followed a mysterious interruption on Monday of a feed from the military tribunal courtroom in Guantánamo Bay.
abstract: Col James L Pohl, military judge overseeing prosecution of Khalid Shaikh Mohammed and four other detainees accused of aiding Sept 11 terrorist attacks, orders government to disconnect technology that allows offstage censors--apparently including Central Intelligence Agency--to block public feed of courtroom proceedings at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba; order follows mysterious interruption of feed from military tribunal courtroom.
lead_paragraph: The order from the judge, Col. James L. Pohl of the Army, followed a mysterious interruption on Monday of a feed from the military tribunal courtroom in Guantánamo Bay.

headline.main: Judge Stops Censorship in Sept. 11 Case
headline.print_headline: Judge Stops Censorship in Sept. 11 Case
